attributes.action: introduce legislation to change electoral law to bar from having a vote in local or national elections, anybody who lives in a house or other property where council tax has not been paid .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That millions of pounds of uncollected council tax have been written off is an immoral abuse of power.  Any person who is not minded to pay towards the running of the country is not entitled to have a vote on who should govern the country.  We must follow the lead of other third world countries and require those who wish to vote to produce ID in the form of a receipt for council tax payment from their local council.  No receipt, no vote.
